chapter.title: RAPT - AVETMISS Reporting in Western Australia

section.title: TAC Client Qualifications Register
section.para: The TAC Qualifications Register is a new module which is being developed for STARS and RTONet. This system will be a permanent register of student achievements from Private Registered Training Organisations (RTOs).

To export this data in the certificate window you can either use the splash screen and click on the Certificate option in the Course Setup tab or the onCourse menu People â†’ Preferences. Once in the certificate window you can export the required data by following the steps below:

listitem.para: You can run the query or filter to return the enrolments you wish to export
Highlight what you want to export from this list of certificates
In the cog wheel, select Export CQR Report

caption.para: View of how to create a CQR report in the list view of the Certificates window

listitem.para: Select the export format of this report and what records will be included either all available records, listed records or highlighted records.

caption.para: View of the exporting options window

listitem.para: Your files will be saved in a folder in the location you have chosen. Locate your files and then upload them to your funding provider.
